headline.main: Spotify and Apple Music: The Goth vs. the Stoner
headline.print_headline: Streaming Music Smackdown: The Stoner vs. the Goth

docs.snippet: The perfect music streaming service, the Haggler writes, would be Spotify without the ghoulish user interface, combined with a clearheaded Apple Music....
docs.abstract: David Segal The Haggler column compares music streaming services Spotify and Apple Music.
docs.lead_paragraph: The perfect music streaming service, the Haggler writes, would be Spotify without the ghoulish user interface, combined with a clearheaded Apple Music.

headline.main: Paying With Cash Hurts. That’s Also Why It Feels So Good.
headline.print_headline: The Sting and Salve of Paying With Cash

docs.snippet: New research finds that spending cash is more painful than using cards. But that same sting makes people feel that their purchases are more valuable....
docs.abstract: Phyllis Korkki Applied Science column on study by Avni M Shah in The Journal of Consumer Research, which reports people assign higher values to purchases made with cash, as opposed to card or digital payments, because transaction is more painful and thereby more meaningful; also notes cash payers are more brand loyal, finding which may be useful for businesses.
docs.lead_paragraph: New research finds that spending cash is more painful than using cards. But that same sting makes people feel that their purchases are more valuable.

headline.main: SpaceX Launching Space Station Docking Port for NASA
headline.print_headline: SpaceX Launching Space Station Docking Port for NASA

headline.main: Dixon Wins IndyCar Pole for 1st Time This Season at Toronto
headline.print_headline: Dixon Wins IndyCar Pole for 1st Time This Season at Toronto

docs.snippet: Scott Dixon used a fast final lap to snatch the pole away from Helio Castroneves at the buzzer in qualifying Saturday for Indy Toronto....

headline.main: Bahrain to Try Top Shi'ite Cleric for Money Laundering
headline.print_headline: Bahrain to Try Top Shi'ite Cleric for Money Laundering

docs.snippet: A Bahraini cleric will go on trial next month on charges of collecting funds illegally and money laundering, the public prosecutor said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Bahraini cleric will go on trial next month on charges of collecting funds illegally and money laundering, the public prosecutor said on Saturday.

headline.main: NBA Great Nate Thurmond, Hall of Fame Center, Dies at 74
headline.print_headline: NBA Great Nate Thurmond, Hall of Fame Center, Dies at 74

docs.snippet: Nate Thurmond, the tenacious defensive center who played with Wilt Chamberlain and was an iconic figure in two cities, died Saturday after a short battle with leukemia. He was 74....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nate Thurmond, the tenacious defensive center who played with Wilt Chamberlain and was an iconic figure in two cities, died Saturday after a short battle with leukemia. He was 74.

headline.main: Most Britons Oppose Second Referendum on EU Exit: Poll
headline.print_headline: Most Britons Oppose Second Referendum on EU Exit: Poll

docs.snippet: The majority of Britons are opposed to a second referendum on membership of the European Union and almost half believe new Prime Minister Theresa May should carry on without calling a general election, according to a poll published on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The majority of Britons are opposed to a second referendum on membership of the European Union and almost half believe new Prime Minister Theresa May should carry on without calling a general election, according to a poll published on Saturday.
